DESCRIPTION: When receiving #yAttack damage, deal the same damage back. NL Then reduce the Return by #b1.
Discard a set amount of cards from the top of your draw pile. (If the number of cards in your draw pile is less than the specified number, discard them ALL).
View the specified number of random cards in your discard pile, you can choose to add any of them into your hand.
When the card is #yReburial or #yExhausted, trigger the effect.
Creatures with #yBullet take #yBullet more damage. NL Each turn, Bullet is reduced by #b1.
At the start of combat or after shuffling, this card goes to the bottom of your draw pile.
The enemies you encounter in the next #bX combat(s) are enhanced by #pSin. NL For each #b1 #pSin you have, increase #b10% #yBlock gained from cards. NL #pSin is reduced by #b1 at the end of combat.

Your next #bX combat(s) will be paid for by #pBlood. NL The cost of #rBloodï¼šAt the start of combat, shuffle #b2 #yWounds / #yDazed / #yCost into your draw pile and gain #b1 #yWeak / #yFrail / #yVulnerable. NL For each #b1 #pBlood you have, increase the damage you deal by #b10%. NL #pBlood is reduced by #b1 at the end of combat.
At the end of your turn, gain #yBlock equal to its amount.
